commissioner_section.title: Commissioner and Chief Strategist
commissioner_section.welcome_statement: Welcome to the Imo State Ministry of Information, Public Orientation and Strategy. I am Hon. Declan Emelumba, Commissioner and Chief Strategist, committed to delivering transparent, timely, and accurate communication on behalf of our government. Under Governor Hope Uzodimma's leadership, our mandate is to ensure public awareness of policies and programs, empower media professionals for ethical journalism, and foster a collaborative civic environment where every citizen is informed and engaged.

departments_list.name: Finance and Accounts
departments_list.description: Ensures accountability for government resources, manages funds, and oversees financial stewardship.

departments_list.name: Information
departments_list.description: Gathers, processes, and disseminates information on government policies, monitors media content, and collects public feedback.

departments_list.name: New Media
departments_list.description: Leverages technology and social media to rapidly share verified information and keep the public updated through digital platforms.

departments_list.name: Planning, Research, and Statistics
departments_list.description: Handles planning, research, data analysis, and procurement to support evidence-based decision-making.

departments_list.name: Public Enlightenment and Orientation
departments_list.description: Conducts public campaigns, preserves government records, and informs citizens about government initiatives.

Services.name: Government Publicity
Services.description: Disseminates news, policies, and official information from the State Government to the public through radio, TV, print, and online media.

Services.name: Media Relations
Services.description: Coordinates press briefings, interviews, and statements on behalf of the Governor and State Executive Council.

Services.name: Public Enlightenment Campaigns
Services.description: Runs campaigns to educate citizens on public health, environment, education reforms, voter registration, etc.

Services.name: Strategic Communication Planning
Services.description: Crafts communication strategies to promote the government's image, counter misinformation, and improve public trust.

Services.name: Crisis and Reputation Management
Services.description: Handles state responses to misinformation, protests, policy backlash, or emergencies through proactive media engagement.

Services.name: Digital Media Monitoring
Services.description: Monitors social media and online platforms to gauge public sentiment and gather feedback for decision-making.

Services.name: Publications and Print Services
Services.description: Manages the production of government bulletins, newsletters, gazettes, and press releases. Operates state-run print media like the *Statesman* newspaper.

Services.name: Speech Writing and Messaging
Services.description: Prepares official speeches, talking points, and public addresses for the Governor and Commissioners.

Services.name: Inter-Ministerial Liaison
Services.description: Works with other ministries (like Health, Environment, Education etc) to publish updates and ensure message consistency.

Projects.name: Digital Training for Journalists
Projects.description: Organized workshops under the theme 'Upgrading Strategic Communication Competence in the Digital Era'. Designed to provide media professionals with necessary skills in digital tools and ICT for more accurate, modern reporting. Commissioner Declan Emelumba represented the government at these events.

Projects.name: Let's Talk TV Media Platform
Projects.description: A television and online engagement platform based within the Imo Digital City. Used for talk shows, interviews, and public consultations, fostering direct connection between government and citizens.

Projects.name: Partnership Engagements for Public Outreach
Projects.description: The ministry supports collaborations with the military, DSS, and youth development agencies to conduct security awareness and youth orientation programs.

Projects.name: SkillUpImo Communication Support
Projects.description: Actively promotes the state's flagship youth empowerment initiative SkillUpImo, which is training thousands of Imolites in digital and Industry 4.0 skills. The Ministry manages public messaging, awareness campaigns, and coordinates coverage related to this agenda. Supports rollout events, press conferences, and collaboration with NGO and international partners such as UNDP and the University of California.
